submission:
class Solution:
    def waysToReachStair(self, k: int) -> int:
        if k == 1:
            return 4
        n = 0
        go = k - 1
        while go > 0:
            go = go // 2
            n += 1
        upstair = pow(2, n) - 1
        downstair = 1 + upstair - k
        if downstair > n + 1:
            return 0
        res = math.comb(n + 1, downstair)
        n += 1
        upstair = pow(2, n) - 1
        downstair = 1 + upstair - k
        if downstair > n + 1:
            return res
        res += math.comb(n + 1, downstair)
        return res
